# Qualitative Analysis App - Copilot Instructions

- [ ] Create and run development task

## Project Overview
Single Page Application for qualitative text analysis inspired by ATLAS.ti/NVivo.
- Client-side only, no backend
- React + Vite + TypeScript
- TailwindCSS + shadcn/ui
- IndexedDB for offline persistence
- NLP with compromise, natural, lda-topic-model
- Visualizations with d3.js and chart.js

## Architecture
- Modular services: NLP, coding, visualization, UI
- Web Workers for heavy processing
- Strong TypeScript typing
- 3-panel layout design
